revised_title: Inedited Coin with Two Legends: Exploring Ancient African and Phoenician Origins
tldr: The author examines an ancient coin with two legends in different languages, providing insights into the history of a maritime town in Africa. The coin's design and inscriptions suggest it was created during the time when the town was inhabited by the Carthaginians, Phoenicians, and Romans. This discovery contributes to the understanding of the cultural exchange and influence between these ancient civilizations.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
